Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local last_attack = 0 local r = game:service("RunService") local humanoid = nil
function onTouched(part)
local h = part.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if h ~= nil and h ~= humanoid and Tool.Attacking.Value == true then h:TakeDamage(5) end
end
function onEquipped() humanoid = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Handle.Touched:connect(onTouched)
function throwTrident()
wait(0.3)
local v = (humanoid.TargetPoint - Tool.Parent.Head.Position).unit
local trident = Tool.Handle:clone() trident.CanCollide = true trident.Locked = true trident.Position = Vector3.new(trident.Position.x,trident.Position.y + 5, trident.Position.z) trident.Velocity = v * 70 trident.CFrame = CFrame.new(trident.Position, humanoid.TargetPoint) trident.CFrame = trident.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(math.pi,0,0)
local script = Tool.TridentScript:clone() script.Parent = trident script.Disabled = false
local force = Instance.new("BodyForce") force.force = Vector3.new(0,400,0) force.Parent = trident
Tool.Handle.Transparency = 1 trident.Name = "Trident" trident.Parent = game.Workspace
wait(4) Tool.Handle.Transparency = 0
end
Tool.Enabled = true function onActivated()
if not Tool.Enabled then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
t = r.Stepped:wait()
if (t - last_attack < .2) then changeValueTo("throw") Tool.Handle.Throw:Play() throwTrident() else Tool.Handle.Stab:Play() changeValueTo("stab") end
last_attack = t
Tool.Enabled = true
end
function changeValueTo(string)
Tool.Action.Value = "changer" wait() Tool.Action.Value = string
end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated)

local Tool = script.Parent local stabAnim = nil local throwAnim = nil local h = nil local con = nil
function standardGrip() Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0,0,0) end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse)
h = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if h == nil then return end stabAnim = h:LoadAnimation(Tool.tridentstab)
stabAnim.KeyframeReached:connect(function(key) if key == "end" then Tool.Attacking.Value = false end end)
throwAnim = h:LoadAnimation(Tool.tridentthrow) mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png"
end
function onUnequippedLocal()
stabAnim:Stop() stabAnim:remove()
throwAnim:Stop() throwAnim:remove()
end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)
function animationManager(value)
if value == "stab" then Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0,0,-1.8) Tool.Attacking.Value = true stabAnim:Play() delay(1.1,standardGrip) elseif value == "throw"then Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0,0,-1) throwAnim:Play() wait(1) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0,0,1) wait(4) end
end
con = Tool.Action.Changed:connect(animationManager)

local trident = script.Parent local debris = game:GetService("Debris") local impaled = false
function onTouched(part)
if not impaled then
impaled = true debris:AddItem(trident, 5)
local weld = Instance.new("Weld") weld.Part0 = trident weld.Parent = trident
local h = part.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if h ~= nil then h:TakeDamage(21) weld.Part1 = h.Parent.Torso else weld.Part1 = part weld.C0 = CFrame.new(trident.Position - part.Position) end
end
end
trident.Touched:connect(onTouched)
wait(10)
trident:remove()
